Amazon is offering the best price to date on the LEGO Super Mario World: Mario & Yoshi set at $104 shipped. Normally, you’d be shelling out $130 for this set directly from LEGO, which famously offers very few discounts; however, at Amazon, it’s been seeing some cascading savings since the end of August, dropping to $119, then $117, and now lower-than-ever to $104. This is a 20% markdown that cuts $26 off the tag price, giving you the all-time lowest price we have tracked since it hit the market back in October.

Buy for $84 (Reg. $150)

What we love

I invested in a fireplace for my patio about 4 years ago now and was just out enjoying it last night. Since the weather has been cooling off, I was quickly reminded just how nice it is to have some heat out there after it gets dark. This patio heater can help you with that as well at a very affordable price. It is ready to heat “spread heat up to an 18-foot diameter.”

We see MagSafe wallets drop to $10 and below from time to time, and today’s offer sets itself apart with a built-in stand. There’s also room for up to 5 cards, which is a nice upgrade from the original 2- or 3-card capacity we used to see.

items.summary:
LISEN MagSafe Gooseneck iPhone Mount

Buy for $12.50 (Reg. $22)

Apply code 9WI2Y6DP during checkout

What we love

The popularity of MagSafe has really paved the way for all sorts of creative mounts to exist. This is certainly one of them, with a gooseneck design that can be twisted and turned all sorts of ways to dial in the perfect viewing angle. A clamp-on style allows it to be attached to all sorts of surfaces ranging from desks to coffee tables, nightstands, and more.

items.title: Here’s how to get a deal on Hollow Knight Silksong before it releases tomorrow morning
items.summary:
We’re only a few hours away from the launch of Hollow Knight: Silksong, which is arriving tomorrow at a surprisingly low $19.99 in the U.S. Just in time for release day, Newegg is running a deal on a $100 Xbox gift card, dropping it to $88 via email delivery. Simply enter promo code SSEWA63 at checkout to secure the discount. Newegg dishes out these discounted gift cards quite frequently, but this one lines up perfectly for picking up Silksong or even stacking up on Game Pass Ultimate ahead of the big launch. The game, in case you’re wondering, is coming to the Xbox Game Pass tomorrow.

more…

items.summary:
iOttie Treker MagSafe Airplane Tray Mount

Buy for $24 (Reg. $28)

What we love

Yes, smaller brands undercut this price point, but some folks prefer to go with bigger, more established brands like iOttie and others. Today’s offer shaves several dollars off and this unit features a really clean design aesthetic that I think stands out from the pack. I also love that there is a built-in carabiner clip too, allowing you to latch it onto a bag and other things for easy access later on.
